comment.body:
With Macro$uxx impact, it can't. But it MUST as it's the best of _modern_ _desktop_ OSes.
But the only reason it can be considered "best" is that nowdays we just can barely stick with Windows XP, as I do since I have got my first laptop in the very 2012. These years (approx. before 2015) it was such a fine experience.
Now I have Debian in dual boot (but as the primary OS for 3,5 years) just to have a modern OS as Win6.x sucks and Win10 sucks too much so it's considered untouchable. And yes, Linux is better in many aspects, so I keep telling it to my clubmates in the clear Web.
Luckily, Py2 version (0.6.5) is still usable.
Do you use the translator to translate your native language posts to English or just to check if it can "understand" your own translation?
@Deliriumgoddess6: I think it's just our president.
